last_symptoms.chief_complaint: I have severe chest pain and difficulty breathing

triage.rationale: Severe chest pain and difficulty breathing are indicative of a serious medical condition that requires immediate attention. The patient's symptoms warrant emergency intervention to prevent potential complications.
care_instructions: Call emergency services immediately. Seek immediate medical attention at the nearest hospital or urgent care center.
